meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> has some hidden <radical>horns</radical>, and if you have the right <radical>alcohol</radical> <radical>measurement</radical> in your body, those horns will come out of your mouth in the form of <kanji>rumor</kanji>s and <kanji>gossip</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: When you start to tell a <kanji>rumor</kanji> or spread <kanji>gossip</kanji>, you're a little drunk, so you slur you words. "<reading>Ooo I saw</reading> (うわさ)..." is how you start every rumor. It's got some southern drawl to it almost (Uuuwahsahw).
